### Data 

https://github.com/nrennie/LondonMarathon


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
remotes::install_github("nrennie/LondonMarathon")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```{.r .cell-code}
data(winners, package = "LondonMarathon")
data(london_marathon, package = "LondonMarathon")
```

### Data Cleaning 

**winners_nationality**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
winners_nationality <- winners %>%
  group_by(Nationality) %>%
  summarise(nat_winners = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(nat_winners))
head(winners_nationality)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 6 × 2
  Nationality    nat_winners
  <chr>                <int>
1 United Kingdom          44
2 Kenya                   31
3 United States           11
4 Switzerland             10
5 Ethiopia                 9
6 Norway                   7
```
:::
:::



:::

# Exploritory Data Analysis

## 1. Bar Graph

(# of winners per country)


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
bar_graph_1 <- ggplot(
  winners_nationality,
  aes(
    x = nat_winners,
    y = reorder(Nationality, nat_winners) 
    )) + 
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
bar_graph_1
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
